## Contact

[NBIS](https://nbis.se) is a platform of the Science for Life Laboratory ([SciLifeLab](https://www.scilifelab.se/)) and the Swedish node of [ELIXIR](https://elixir-europe.org/). This event is organized in co-operation between Uppsala University and Campus Gotland Uppsala University, Sweden.

For queries, write to us at **raukr[at]nbis.se**.
